item.title: The Hidden Winners of AI: Companies You Haven`t Thought About (But Should)
item.description:
Everyone’s talking about OpenAI, Google, and Microsoft when it comes to AI. But here’s the thing â€“ while you’re watching the headlines, there are quietly profitable companies making bank behind the scenes. Think of it like the California Gold Rush: everyone focused on the miners, but the real winners? The guys selling shovels.

The Infrastructure Players: Building AI’s Foundation

Data Centers Are the New Real Estate

Remember when people said “location, location, location” about real estate? Well, now it’s “compute, compute, compute” for AI. Companies like Digital Realty Trust and Equinix own the warehouses where AI magic happens.
